data.actual_result: Clyde strips every single emote, even ones that should work.
data.expected_result: Clyde only strips the emote that isn't on the server you're in.
data.short_description: Attempting to put an emoji from a different server in your message will strip all custom emojis from the message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Put a custom emote (one that's on the server you're in or is global) in your message. - Try to put an emote (that isnt global) from another server into the message.
